summary:
****REQUIRES HEARTHFIRE and UPDATE 1.8.151.0 or greater****

Hadley Manor is a purchasable player house located in the Whiterun Hold directly across from Battle-Born Farm. To purchase the property see Angelet in Riverwood at the Sleeping Giant Inn. If you aren\'t getting the dialogue to purchase the house move the mod up in the load order. (Quest
descriptionHtml:
The main house includes:
- Fully stocked kitchen with oven, cooking pot, butter churn, and mead barrel.
- Trophy and armory with numerous mannequins, weapon racks, and trophy bases.
- Balcony library
- Alchemy and enchanting lab
- 3 bedrooms including the master suite
- All 9 shrines of the divines
- Plenty of storage

Exterior includes
- Blacksmithing
- Plantable garden and planters
- Aviary
- Grain mill
- 2 chickens
- Cow
- Stable
- Ore veins
- Wood chopping block

Servantâ€™s house
Home of Espan Popelina and wife Angelet. Espan guards the Manor exterior and can be your follower while Lynet is your on-site 24/7 merchant with a generous purse.

NOTES:
*In order for your spouse and/or children to live here you will need another mod. Such as Spouses Can Live Everywhere http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11370
author: ricslady99
